New Records: Luis Gil allowed a career-high four home runs in a single game.
Key Match Events: Luis Gil allowed six runs on six hits while walking one and striking out five across 5.2 innings.
Jazz Chisholm hit a solo home run in the bottom of the fifth inning.
Jazz Chisholm hit an RBI double later in the game.
Aaron Judge went 0-for-5 with five strikeouts, including a strikeout with the bases loaded in the bottom of the ninth inning.
Yasmani Grandal homered and finished 3-for-4 with three RBI.
Pre-Game Insights: Saturday's pitching matchup featured two Rookie of the Year candidates, Luis Gil and Paul Skenes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Paul Skenes retired all six batters he faced, including striking out Juan Soto, Aaron Judge, and Jazz Chisholm.
David Bednar struck out Jazz Chisholm with the bases loaded in a critical moment.
